summary: OPO is a WIP mod that replaces all the textures in the game to look like it was oil painted.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000]!!IMPORTANT!![/color]
TO INSTALL updated HD TEXTURES FOR 0.2 - click on mirrors and choose the first one.

0.3 is coming soon with TONS of new changes and custom made textures. This will include water/sky textures as well as a complete overhaul of existing content. ETA is most likely around a month.

ABOUT
Oil Paint Overhaul is a mod I thought about creating for some time. Currently it is just a texture replacer for all of skyrim, and it is still a work in progress. If you find any bugs or issues, please leave a comment!
author: mitmitmit
